title.rendered: INTECH secures long-term maintenance and technical support services contract for a leading petrochemical manufacturing company in Saudi Arabia

content.rendered:
INTECH has secured a long-term contract to provide maintenance and technical support services for a leading petrochemical manufacturing company in Saudi Arabia.

This project is the latest in a series of project wins for INTECH in the Kingdom, bearing testimony to the ever-growing trust it enjoys from the leading oil & gas, petrochemical, and power companies. INTECH, over the last 25 years, has compiled excellent references of successful project completions, covering all the asset classes with the leading companies in the Kingdom.

INTECH’s business relationship with the client on this project spans over more than decade. For this project, the customer reached out to INTECH to provide maintenance and technical services for their control systems and HMIs from multiple vendors as well as SCADA for a period of 5 years. INTECH’s services will cover more than 25 facilities in multiple cities including plant areas, labs, and company headquarters.

INTECH O&M team will provide the following services:

  • Detailed Site Surveys
  • Preventive Maintenance
  • On-Call Services
  • Resident Services
  • Emergency Services
  • Corrective Maintenance
  • Shutdown Maintenance Services
  • 24/7 Remote Support Services
  • Software maintenance and upgrades
  • Spares management

How we are responding to COVID 19: We are ensuring that our services and business agreements are executed to the satisfaction of our clients and partners without exposing anyone to COVID 19. Our factories are operational with significant new safety measures. We have devised a global COVID 19 plan that covers international movement, precautions, behavioral changes, and contingency & emergency response options for all our business regions.

If you are an INTECH client and have not received information about our business continuity plans, please feel free to reach out to an INTECH account manager or project manager.

About INTECH’s O&M Solutions

INTECH’s O&M services provide long-term asset healthcare, maintenance and upgrades ensuring sustained operation of assets for their planned life and beyond. Our project experiences help us gain valuable knowledge of systems, improving our learning curve in comparison to a third-party O&M provider, thereby reducing O&M risks & costs. With INTECH’s diverse expertise of control systems and oil & gas application, we also help reduce hassle of managing multiple vendors for any O&M situation. A single INTECH resource is skilled at handling multiple systems – saving both finances and time.

For more information visit: https://www.intechww.com/products-and-solutions/operations-and-maintenance/

About INTECH

INTECH Process Automation Inc. is an international Control Systems engineering and Systems Integration company delivering reliable automation solutions to the Oil & Gas sector since 1991. INTECH has done projects in 31 countries across 6 continents with regional offices in 13 countries, equipping it with 2000+ engineering man-years of experience. INTECH’s vendor-neutral approach and extensive experience help serve both regional and global customers with the highest standards of quality and reliability.

INTECH covers all traditional asset classes (upstream, midstream & downstream) as well as shale and buoy automation. Its wide range of solutions covers traditional control system automation as well as hydraulic (surface and sub-surface) control system automation and advanced software solutions for operations and asset management. Customers benefit from INTECH’s lump-sum turnkey solutions to save costs and increase plant productivity.

For more information visit: www.intechww.com
